post.body: I had a dream last night, where we pulled off your mask and you looked like Will Ferrell. And you had a lasa apso, "Poodle"
omnivore Spore ftw
have fun hot tubbing for me!!
pulled pork... Huhhuh... pork is cool
i just found my ol album collection, no idea wot 2do w it. want an inventory of th titles? What do u usually pay for a record?
wot you up 2 4 New Years?
Btw. PacNW headed 4 tropical monsoon all week- worse @ weeks end. lots o warm rain & wind.
Giacomo th Betta is a much happier fishy now that his h20 is in th mid 70s! I feel so bad bout my blunder.
http://tinyurl.com/7xxnw2 Virginty pledges fail? SHOCKED!
Making blini 4 th first time in over a decade & listening 4 my hens...
!#@%&/>! Somethin is in th coop & i cant find my headlamp! Went w a keychain LED & sparklers but cant c anything! dead hens 4 sure
Th good news is th petshoppe is open & heaters r 10% off
just realized w regret th lackluster spirit o my beloved betta has been bc o th inhouse cold temp. I forget that others r not pregnant :/
Still laughing cause Al said i move like a pig crawling on a branch
http://tinyurl.com/86ptl7 I'm pretty sure Mike Duncan is a robot.
http://tinyurl.com/9rq9h8 What kind of crack is Rice smoking??
you know the secret to easy birth? Aside from contraception... I do 100 kegels every time I think about labor during the 3rd trimester
http://tinyurl.com/7638v9 Prudes protest breastfeeding images on FaceBook. Well... DON'T LOOK!!!
Al watched me try 2 get over 2 her on th bed 2 hug her goodnight. Said that I move "like a pig trying crawl on a little branch" Thanks, kid.
=) Sushi! OMNOMNOMNOM!!! Only 3 weekends or so left b4 Squiddy makes such nights difficult.
